com.notification

Class NotificationFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.notification.NotificationFactory

  • public final class NotificationFactory
extends Object
    Creates Notifications using a ThemePackage. It is possible to add custom Notifications by adding NotificationBuilders.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setThemePackage

        public void setThemePackage(ThemePackage pack)
        Sets the themes that the factory should use when creating notifications. See ThemePackagePresets for some default themes.
        Parameters:
        pack - the ThemePackage to set

      • addBuilder

        public <T extends Notification> void addBuilder(Class<T> notificationClass,
                                                NotificationBuilder<T> builder)
        Adds a custom NotificationBuilder. Notifications can then be built using build(Class notificationClass).
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of Notification of the NotificationBuilder
        Parameters:
        notificationClass - the Class of the Notification that should be built
        builder - the NotificationBuilder that builds the notificationClass

      • removeBuilder

        public <T extends Notification> void removeBuilder(Class<T> notificationClass)
        Removes the NotificationBuilder associated with this notification class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of Notification of the NotificationBuilder
        Parameters:
        notificationClass - the Class of the Notification built by the NotificationBuilder that should be removed

      • build

        public <T extends Notification> T build(Class<T> notificationClass)
        Builds a Notification using the NotificationBuilder associated with the notification class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of Notification of the NotificationBuilder
        Parameters:
        notificationClass - the Class of the Notification to build
        Returns:
        the built Notification

      • build

        public <T extends Notification> T build(Class<T> notificationClass,
                                        Object... args)
        Builds a Notification using the NotificationBuilder associated with the notification class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of Notification of the NotificationBuilder
        Parameters:
        notificationClass - the class of the Notification to build
        args - the args passed to the NotificationBuilder
        Returns:
        the built Notification

        Builds a TextNotification.
        Parameters:

        subtitle - the subtitle to display on the TextNotification
        Returns:
        the built TextNotification

      • buildAcceptNotification

        public AcceptNotification buildAcceptNotification(String title,
                                                  String subtitle)
        Builds an AcceptNotification with "Accept" and "Decline" as the button messages.
        Parameters:
        title - the title to display on the AcceptNotification
        subtitle - the subtitle to display on the AcceptNotification
        Returns:
        the built AcceptNotification

      • buildAcceptNotification

        public AcceptNotification buildAcceptNotification(String title,
                                                  String subtitle,
                                                  String accept,
                                                  String decline)
        Builds an AcceptNotification with the specified Strings.
        Parameters:
        title - the title to display on the AcceptNotification
        subtitle - the subtitle to display on the AcceptNotification
        accept - the text on the accept button
        decline - the text on the decline button
        Returns:
        the built AcceptNotification

      • buildIconNotification

        public IconNotification buildIconNotification(String from,
                                              String title,
                                              String subtitle,
                                              ImageIcon icon)
        Builds an IconNotification.
        Parameters:
        from - the from field to display
        title - the title to display on the IconNotification
        subtitle - the subtitle to display on the IconNotification
        icon - the icon on the IconNotification
        Returns:
        the built IconNotification
